ygData.subject: RE: a Bards rant on getting thru hell level part one (l vl 30) -long txt
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ouch, same thing happens to me. The only good thing about the hell levels is they make the regular levels seem so damn fast. I worked so hard to make it
ygData.messageBody:
> Friday at the start I hit 35. I played 16-20 hours a day in Lower Guk
> fighting all sorts of nasties and hit 36 on Wednesday night. Truly hellish.
> The good news, I did the same thing for the next few days and because of the
> killing pace I had set for myself during 35 I went from 36 to 39 in less
> than a week. Guess what, I am in 40 now and its worse.

Ouch, same thing happens to me. The only good thing about the hell levels
is they make the regular levels seem so damn fast. I worked so hard to
make it through 35 that I did 36/37/38/39 in a day each (with a one day
'break'). Now I'm 40 also.. back to hell again.
